name: SpaceROCKS !
description:
READ ME !

Controls:

Q E Strave

W Burst

A D Rotate

SPACE Pew Pew

How To ;

you have only 1 Try!

Shoot the rocks to pickup Points.Avoid the redstones.

If you die just press "R" to generate a new Level and keep your Score.

Pickups:

Redboxes: adds a life

Blueboxes: adds 100 Score

P.S there is no sound in space !
